 You know where the complaints are coming from and I feel it is a shame because I know Kronus is a highly unbiased person when it comes to judging and is well respected by the reasonable posters on this forum. I say this even though we pretty much disagree on everything.

 Sorry, but I for one don't share that opinion at all based on many exchanges I've had with him. I have nothing against him personally, but I can think of few people that I'd less want to see moderating on any forum. Again, that's not meant as an insult to him; just stating my disagreement with you here--I'm sure *I* wouldn't make a good moderator. But I wouldn't want to be.

 Well there seems to be more bickering about lying now that this forum is here than it was before it was here. So IMO it's doing more to invite such bickering than helping the situation. I think the admin's goals were good though. I think the problem is that people generally take offense to being called a liar and it sometimes turns into an angry discussion. A forum dedicated to that invites such discussion, IMO.
